name: muzziness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being confused and unable to think clearly because of tiredness, illness, alcohol, or drugs: There was mild headache and muzziness but no memory loss. Nick had only a vague muzziness behind his eyes.
the quality of not being clear or well explained: The public's rejection of the promotion may well have been due to muzziness and lack of clarity. See
muzzy
More examplesFewer examplesWhen you sit up, be aware of any signs of dizziness or muzziness.He smiled in spite of the muzziness clouding his head and answered the phone.He shook his head to clear the muzziness of sleep.Some standard self-help muzziness creeps into this book.
